I was so looking forward to getting this and wearing it to a party.  When I put it on, I would have laughed if I hadn't been so disappointed.  I'm short at 5'2" and usually wear a size large (14).  Based on reviews and comments, I ordered a medium and it was PLENTY big.  I looked kind of like a chubby sumu wrestler in this. I can see where someone tall and slender would look attractive in this;  kind of like a Greek Goddess;  me, I looked more like a square with arms and legs.  Anyway, I did like the material and it's a good concept; just not for me.  ORDER A SIZE DOWN FROM YOUR USUAL FOR SURE.

评论概述: Very comfortable and can be worn long or short
评论详情: I am 56, 5ft 6 and 240 lbs, with 53 inch hips and a fupa from 3 kids + menopause + COVID eating. I absolutely did NOT think this was going to both hide my extra padding AND still look good, but it shockingly actually does. I would still wear a body smoother for my own comfort but I am thrilled AND, as I was pulling it on over my head realized because the bottom is cinched and my hips are wide I can actually leave the bottom at my waist and it looks a regular dress, hanging prettily right to my knees. There is a woman in the comments with a pic wearing it that way and I didnt understand what she meant til this happened. Im guessing after a few wears the bottom wont be tight enough to wear it like that but it'll be fun til then!
I have one in black, but I bought last year much better quality. The fabric is thin and even though I Ordered the same size it’s smaller than I want it
